displayProperties.name: Hot Swap
displayProperties.description:
Switching to this weapon while you are damaged strongly increases its handling for a short duration.

Swords gain increased charge speed, guard resistance, and guard endurance instead.

displayProperties.name: Thar Be Treasure!
displayProperties.description: Adds a treasure chest appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Beacons
displayProperties.description: While you are amplified, your Arc Special weapon final blows create a blinding explosion.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Recharge
displayProperties.description: While critically wounded, your melee and grenade energy regenerates more quickly.

displayProperties.name: Voltshot
displayProperties.description: Reloading this weapon after defeating a target overcharges this weapon for a short period of time, causing it to jolt on its next hit.

displayProperties.name: Zen Moment
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with this weapon reduces recoil over time. Improves base stability.

displayProperties.name: Under-Over
displayProperties.description: Deals bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.

displayProperties.name: Pumpkin Bomb
displayProperties.description: Adds a pumpkin appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: End of the Rainbow
displayProperties.description: Adds a rainbow appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Invigoration
displayProperties.description: Reduces melee cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Trace Evidence
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants affected by Arc debuffs spawns an Ionic Trace.

displayProperties.name: Amped Up
displayProperties.description: Stay amplified longer.

displayProperties.name: Thunderous Retort
displayProperties.description: Grants bonus Arc Super damage if cast while critically wounded or while amplified. Lasts until the end of the Super activation.

displayProperties.name: Sundering Glare
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits against distant combatants weaken them for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
displayProperties.description: After throwing an Arc grenade, gain increased grenade recharge for a short time. Arc final blows extend the duration of this benefit.

displayProperties.name: Harmonic Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid weapon final blows with damage matching your subclass type create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Under-Over
displayProperties.description: Deals improved bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.

displayProperties.name: Slickdraw
displayProperties.description: Significantly increases handling, decreases target acquisition.

displayProperties.name: Tempest Strike
displayProperties.description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to unleash a devastating uppercut attack that travels along the ground in front of you, damaging and jolting targets it hits.

displayProperties.name: Ionic Interment
displayProperties.description: Collecting an Ionic Trace partially reloads the magazine from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Return Stroke
displayProperties.description: Causing a lightning strike with this weapon partially reloads the magazine from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Scout Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Scout Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Juggernaut
displayProperties.description:
With full class ability energy and after sprinting for a short time, you gain a frontal shield that blocks incoming damage. When the frontal shield breaks, your class ability energy is depleted.

While amplified, the shield blocks significantly more damage before breaking.

displayProperties.name: Machine Gun Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Machine Guns over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Bottomless Bounty I
displayProperties.description: Improves the effect of the Right Hook and Runneth Over weapon Origin perks.

displayProperties.name: Better Already
displayProperties.description: Your health begins to regenerate immediately after picking up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Sniper Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Momentum
displayProperties.description: Sliding over ammo bricks reloads your equipped weapon and grants a small amount of melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Rocket Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Touch of Thunder
displayProperties.description:
Your Flashbang, Pulse, Lightning, and Storm Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Flashbang Grenade: Emits an additional blinding flash on bounce.

Pulse Grenade: Creates Ionic Traces periodically as it damages targets and increases in damage over time.

Lightning Grenade: Grants an additional grenade charge, and jolts targets hit by the initial blast.

Storm Grenade: After detonating, creates a roaming thundercloud that tracks nearby targets and fires bolts of lightning at foes beneath it.

displayProperties.name: Dark-Forged Trigger
displayProperties.description: Removes hipfire accuracy penalties and increases rate of fire from hip. Stacks of Cranial Spike increase hip rate of fire further.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Chaser
displayProperties.description: Landing multiple rockets loads a grenade. [Alternate Weapon Action]  to switch into Grenade Launcher mode.

displayProperties.name: Recuperation
displayProperties.description: Replenishes health each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Surge
displayProperties.description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to blink forward, calling down lightning strikes that jolt targets as you rematerialize.

displayProperties.name: Dynamic Duo
displayProperties.description: Consuming your Arc grenade grants an Arc Soul and amplifies you.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Reach
displayProperties.description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy.

 [Super]  while active to deactivate your Super early, saving Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Stormtrance
displayProperties.description:
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands to electrify targets with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time. Casting Stormtrance creates a shockwave underneath you.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Grenade Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Brilliance
displayProperties.description: Defeating a blinded target with precision damage creates a blinding explosion.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Tracers
displayProperties.description: Land multiple hits to fire homing micro-rockets.

displayProperties.name: Conduction Tines
displayProperties.description: Arc ability or Jolt final blows restore Arc abilities.

displayProperties.name: Knockout
displayProperties.description:
Critically wounding a target or breaking their shield infuses your melee attacks with Arc energy and increases your melee range and damage for a short time.

Defeating targets with melee attacks starts health regeneration and makes you amplified.

displayProperties.name: Gutshot Straight
displayProperties.description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage, decreases target acquisition.

displayProperties.name: Bow Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.

displayProperties.name: Submachine Gun Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Submachine Guns.

displayProperties.name: Fists of Havoc
displayProperties.description:
Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, dealing damage in an area around you and leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Thundercrash
displayProperties.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into targets to inflict meteoric damage.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Shadow
displayProperties.description: Combusts combatants with explosive slugs. Strong against  [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Discharge
displayProperties.description: Arc weapon final blows have a chance to create an Ionic Trace.

displayProperties.name: Reign Havoc
displayProperties.description: Final blows generate lightning strikes. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Search Party
displayProperties.description: This weapon is granted faster aim down sights speed and movement speed while aiming down sights when no allies are near.

displayProperties.name: Pugilist
displayProperties.description:
Final blows with this weapon generate improved melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Magnitude
displayProperties.description: Your lingering Arc grenades (Lightning Grenade, Pulse Grenade, and Storm Grenade) have extended duration.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons.

displayProperties.name: Poison Arrows
displayProperties.description: Fires poison arrows on full draw and quick release. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Ions
displayProperties.description: Defeating a jolted target creates an Ionic Trace.

displayProperties.name: Zen Moment
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with this weapon reduces recoil over time.

displayProperties.name: Queen's Wrath
displayProperties.description: When aiming down sights and fully drawn, gain Truesight. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Electrostatic Mind
displayProperties.description:
Defeating targets with Arc abilities or defeating jolted or blinded targets creates an Ionic Trace.

Collecting an Ionic Trace makes you amplified.

displayProperties.name: Lethal Current
displayProperties.description:
After dodging, your next melee attack has increased lunge range, jolts the target, and creates a damaging aftershock.

Damaging any jolted target with melee attacks also blinds them.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Frequency
displayProperties.description: Melee hits greatly increase your reload speed for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Randomized Perks
displayProperties.description: This item comes with randomized perks.

displayProperties.name: Shotgun Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Shotguns.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Shock
displayProperties.description: Your Arc grenades jolt targets.

displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Fusion Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Sidearms.

displayProperties.name: Skulking Wolf
displayProperties.description: While at low health, Guardian final blows with this weapon grant enhanced radar and remove you from opposing radar.

displayProperties.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
displayProperties.description: Full auto. Faster reload on empty.

displayProperties.name: Charged with Blight
displayProperties.description: Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in darkness and temporarily blinding them.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Gods
displayProperties.description: Gain melee energy and create lightning strikes with Thunderclap.

displayProperties.name: Cranial Spike
displayProperties.description: Precision hits grant bonus target acquisition and range.

displayProperties.name: Randomized Perks + 1
displayProperties.description: This item comes with randomized perks, as well as an extra perk in the right trait column.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Volts
displayProperties.description: Finishers make you amplified.

displayProperties.name: Gun and Run
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets with this weapon grants bonus sprint speed. Guardians, powerful combatants, and high-value targets grant this bonus quicker.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Feedback
displayProperties.description: Taking melee damage briefly increases your outgoing melee damage.

displayProperties.name: Slickdraw
displayProperties.description: Significantly increases handling, significantly decreases target acquisition.

displayProperties.name: Pugilist
displayProperties.description:
Final blows with this weapon generate melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.

displayProperties.name: Arc Staff
displayProperties.description:
Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.

[Block] : Hold to deflect incoming projectiles with your Arc staff.

displayProperties.name: Gathering Storm
displayProperties.description:
Hurl your Arc Staff forward, embedding it into surfaces or large targets and jolting nearby targets.

After a short time, a devastating lightning bolt strikes the staff, overcharging it with Arc energy. While overcharged, your staff discharges lightning at nearby foes.

displayProperties.name: Ionic Conductor
displayProperties.description: Improved ionic traces

displayProperties.name: Randomized Perks + 1
displayProperties.description: This item comes with randomized perks, as well as an extra perk in the left trait column.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Hedrons
displayProperties.description: Dramatically increases weapon stability, weapon aim assist, weapon airborne effectiveness, mobility, resilience, and recovery after freezing a target with [Stasis] Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Rounds
displayProperties.description: This weapon fires faster and more accurately the longer the trigger is held. Continuous damage generates stunning lightning strikes.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Domineering
displayProperties.description: After suppressing a target, you gain greatly increased mobility for a short duration and your equipped weapon is reloaded from reserves.
Faster ready and stow speed for Grenade Launchers.
displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Scout Rifles.
displayProperties.name: Scout Rifle Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Spark of Recovery
displayProperties.name: Spark of Recovery

displayProperties.description: Slightly faster ready and stow speed for Power weapons.
displayProperties.name: Power Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons, Sidearms, and Submachine Guns.
displayProperties.name: Light Arms Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Rocket Launchers.
displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns each time you pick up an Orb of Power.
displayProperties.name: Absolution

displayProperties.description: Reduces grenade cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.
displayProperties.name: Innervation

displayProperties.description: Slightly faster ready and stow speed for Kinetic weapons.
displayProperties.name: Kinetic Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Greatly increased ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons.
displayProperties.name: Enhanced Hand Cannon Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Submachine Guns.
displayProperties.name: Enhanced Submachine Gun Loader

displayProperties.description: Faster reload for Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, Machine Guns, and Shotguns.
displayProperties.name: Large Weapon Loader

displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for all Rifle-class weapons.
displayProperties.name: Rifle Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Defeating Vex Minotaurs grants Gunsmith Materials. Mod does not stack.
displayProperties.name: Labyrinth Miner

displayProperties.description: Defeating Hive combatants with finishers grants extra Glimmer. Mod does not stack.
displayProperties.name: Dark Glimmer

displayProperties.description: Slightly faster ready and stow speed for Energy weapons.
displayProperties.name: Energy Dexterity

displayProperties.description: Defeating Hive combatants grants extra Glimmer. Mod does not stack.
displayProperties.name: Biomonetizer

displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.
displayProperties.name: Bow Dexterity
